description:
Private Health Record Application
Harp is a privacy centric on-device Personal Health Record application allowing you to create and manage records in plain Org Mode files that are completely under your control.

Harp is under active development, expect more features to land soon. The core structure of the Org Mode file can be seen on the app website. Based on that you can work on harp records from Emacs on your desktop by just syncing the backing Org mode files.
